I

INDIBasicServer - Class in laazotea.indi.server.examples
A simple INDI Server that basically sends all messages from drivers and clients and viceversa, just performing basic checks of messages integrity.
INDIBasicServer() - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.examples.INDIBasicServer
Constructs the server.
INDIBasicServer(int) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.examples.INDIBasicServer
Constructs the server with a particular port.
INDIClient - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class to represent a Client that connects to the Server.
INDIClient(Socket, AbstractINDIServer) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDIClient
Constructs a new INDIClient that connects to the server and starts listening to it.
INDIDevice - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class that represents a generic INDI Device to which the server connects and parses its messages.
INDIDevice(AbstractINDIServer) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDIDevice
Constructs a new INDIDevice.
INDIDeviceListener - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class that represents a listener to devices.
INDIDeviceListener() - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener
Constructs a new INDIDeviceListener.
INDIJavaDevice - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class that represent a Java Device (created with the INDI Driver library).
INDIJavaDevice(AbstractINDIServer, Class, String) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDIJavaDevice
Constructs a new Java Device and starts listening to its messages.
INDINativeDevice - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class that represent a Native Device (created with the usual INDI library).
INDINativeDevice(AbstractINDIServer, String) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDINativeDevice
Constructs a new Native Device and launches it as a external process.
INDINetworkDevice - Class in laazotea.indi.server
A class that represent a Network Device (another INDI server).
INDINetworkDevice(AbstractINDIServer, String, int) - Constructor for class laazotea.indi.server.INDINetworkDevice
Constructs a new Network Device and connects to it.
isAlreadyLoaded(String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.AbstractINDIServer
Checks if a particular Driver is already loaded.
isBeingDestroyed() - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDIDevice
Notify drivers that they are being destroyed.
isBeingDestroyed() - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDIJavaDevice
 
isBeingDestroyed() - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDINativeDevice
 
isBeingDestroyed() - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDINetworkDevice
 
isBLOBAccepted(String, String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDIDeviceListener
Gets information about if BLOB updates should be sended according to the BLOB Enable rules.
isDevice(String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.DevicePropertyBLOBEnableTuple
Checks if the Device has a particular name.
isDevice(String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDIDevice
Checks if the Device corresponds to a particular Device Identifier.
isDevice(String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDIJavaDevice
Checks if the Device corresponds to a particular Device Identifier.
isDevice(String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.INDINativeDevice

isProperty(String, String) - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.DevicePropertyBLOBEnableTuple
Checks if the Device has a particular name and the Property has a particular name.
isServerRunning() - Method in class laazotea.indi.server.AbstractINDIServer
Gets if the server is listening for new Clients to connect.
